delete.tagAddError: Some error happens when try to add new tag to file
delete.tagError: Some error happens when try to remove tag {tag} from file!

file.forceDelete: Some error happened when deleting files!
file.load: Some error happened when loading files!
file.upload: Some error happened when files loading!

member.edit: Some error happened when information about user updating!
member.get: Some error happened when getting data about member!
member.logout: Some error happened when you try to log out from your account!

errors.previewUpdate: Some error happened when you try to change the setting for files preview!
errors.tagsCreate: Some error happens when try to create new tag!
errors.tagsUpdate: Some errors happen when try to delete tag!

info.limit: Your set limit of {max} GB will be exceeded soon, because the current weight of uploaded files + reserved 100 mb is more than the limit.

file.downloading: File downloading, please, wait some time!
file.nothing: List of uploaded files is empty!
file.placeholder: Search by name of a file
file.uploading: File uploading, please, wait some time...

forceDelete.description: Attention! This action cannot be undone, all files will be unreachably deleted from S3 and the database.
forceDelete.title: Confirm deletion
